attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think it is unfair that women can not play for the england rugby team/football teams with men we are capeable to do so and their is an issue with women being managers and coatches and in schools girls are critized by boys with the issue of playing a so called boy/mans sport. we should have mixed teams for ALL sport
thankyou for hearing my point of veiw
